scripts.build-windows: npm run build && move out\cardInfo.html.html out\cardInfo.html && move out\explore.html.html out\explore.html && move out\search.html.html out\search.html
scripts.build-linux: npm run build && mv out/cardInfo.html.html out/cardInfo.html && mv out/explore.html.html out/explore.html && mv out/search.html.html out/search.html
